Articles.Content:
Hello Folks,

Ace is looking for a mod for the old MK3 parts. In particular a crew cabin for the old stock MK3 parts. I meant to get it from the space port but never got around to it and now its gone! Does anyone know of a post here on the forum for that old MK3 mod? Does anyone know of a lingering github link? Any old mk3 system fans out there? Can someone help Ace?

Even though the massively offset CoM, the old mk3 parts are more space-looking than our new mk3, commercial plane parts.

I'd love seeing such a mod, maybe a mk2.5?

Ace's feelings about the new MK3 parts can best be expressed in a monolog by Al "Cutty" White in the 1980 major motion picture "Airplane"; 

"S'mofo butter layin' me to da' bone. Jackin' me up... tight me."
